maker = pd.get_dummies(df['make'], drop_first=True)
fuel = pd.get_dummies(df['fuel-type'], drop_first=True)
doors = pd.get_dummies(df['num-of-doors'], drop_first=True)
aspi = pd.get_dummies(df['aspiration'], drop_first=True)
body = pd.get_dummies(df['body-style'], drop_first=True)
drive = pd.get_dummies(df['drive-wheels'], drop_first=True)
engloc = pd.get_dummies(df['engine-location'], drop_first=True)
engtype = pd.get_dummies(df['engine-type'], drop_first=True)
cylinders = pd.get_dummies(df['num-of-cylinders'], drop_first=True)
